content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 44}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=42.0, y=-81.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 43}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=45.0, y=-80.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 44}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=40.0, y=-79.0))

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory exists

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity.
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has fuel and ingredients before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a fluid system before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a fluid system and has a power connection before attempting to use it.
